name: Disciples II: Gallean's Return
description:
Disciples II is a turn-based strategy game in which you guide the role of one of four races struggling for survival and dominance of your war-torn world. You will create armies to conquer and control territory, hire powerful Mages and Warriors, develop your fledgling cities, and lead your race to glory. Using a careful balance of diplomacy, resource
management, magic, and military might, you will strive to etch your name in the long and bloody history of Nevendaar.

Disciples II: Gallean's Return is a compilation edition that includes the base game, Disciples II: Dark Prophecy, plus the two standalone expansions Disciples II: Guardians of the Light and Disciples II: Servants of the Dark.
